paper_abstract: We present a unified semidefinite programming hierarchies rounding approximation algorithm for a class of maximum graph bisection problems with improved approximation ratios. Under the above algorithmic framework, we show that the approximation ratios of MAX-n/2-CUT, MAX-n/2-DENSE-SUBGRAPH, and MAX-n/ 2-VERTEX-COVER are equal to those of MAX-n/2-UNCUT, MAX-n/2-DIRECTED-CUT, and MAX-n/2-DIRECTED-UNCUT, respectively.
paper_title: An improved semidefinite programming hierarchies rounding approximation algorithm for maximum graph bisection problems
